dialogue.line: I have something to tell you, it's going to sound a little crazy.
I have the power to transform into Slavic mythical beasts.
What do you mean? Like a Vodyanoy?
Yes, like Vodyanoy, also like Leshy, and also like other Slavic creatures, I can take on the shape of any Slavic mythical creature I can think of.
Wow, that's incredible. How did you discover this power?
It started a few months ago. I was feeling really stressed out and I closed my eyes to take a deep breath. When I opened them, I was in the form of a Rusalka.
I can't even imagine what that must have been like. How do you control it?
I'm still figuring it out, but I think it's tied to my emotions. When I'm calm and focused, I can change at will. But when I'm upset or scared, it happens involuntarily.
